curam.util.ctm.bom.rules.impl

Class RulesReadAndUpsertBOMImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • curam.util.ctm.bom.BusinessObjectModuleImpl
      • curam.util.ctm.bom.rules.impl.RulesReadAndUpsertBOMImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    BusinessObjectModule, ReadAndUpsertBOM

    public class RulesReadAndUpsertBOMImpl
extends BusinessObjectModuleImpl
implements ReadAndUpsertBOM
    This class is responsible for reading, updating and inserting Ruleset BOM information. A Ruleset BOM consists of the ruleset and its associated sub-rulesets and ruleset links.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      RulesReadAndUpsertBOMImpl()
      This is a no-arg constructor setting the business object type to be Ruleset and the offset to 0.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      org.w3c.dom.Document convertBusinessObjectContentToXML(BusinessObjectIdentifier boIdentifier)
      This method takes in a ruleset ID as the key for the Ruleset BOM, and uses this key to retrieve the ruleset records and links.
      void setPrimaryKey(java.lang.Object key, java.lang.Object value, java.lang.String entityName)
      Sets the primary key value of the Ruleset BOM.
      void upsert(BusinessObjectIdentifier boIdentifier, org.w3c.dom.Document boDocument)
      Each BOM must determine on insert/update on a per-entity basis (for each entity in the business object) whether or not it needs to insert the entity (if it does not already exist), or update it (if it already exists).
      void upsertEntity(java.lang.String entityName, java.lang.Object entityDtlsObj)
      Update or insert an entity based on the entity name.

    • Method Detail

      • convertBusinessObjectContentToXML

        public org.w3c.dom.Document convertBusinessObjectContentToXML(BusinessObjectIdentifier boIdentifier)
                                                       throws AppException,
                                                              InformationalException
        This method takes in a ruleset ID as the key for the Ruleset BOM, and uses this key to retrieve the ruleset records and links. All of this information is then stored in XML format as specified by the BOM infrastructure.
        Specified by:
        convertBusinessObjectContentToXML in interface ReadAndUpsertBOM
        Parameters:
        boIdentifier - Contains the ruleset identifier.
        Returns:
        xml representation of the Ruleset BOM.
        Throws:
        InformationalException - Generic Exception Signature.
        AppException - Generic Exception Signature.

      • upsert

        public void upsert(BusinessObjectIdentifier boIdentifier,
                   org.w3c.dom.Document boDocument)
            throws AppException,
                   InformationalException
        Each BOM must determine on insert/update on a per-entity basis (for each entity in the business object) whether or not it needs to insert the entity (if it does not already exist), or update it (if it already exists).
        Specified by:
        upsert in interface ReadAndUpsertBOM
        Parameters:
        boIdentifier - Contains business object identifier.
        boDocument - Contains xml document representing the business object.
        Throws:
        InformationalException - Generic Exception Signature.
        AppException - Generic Exception Signature.

      • setPrimaryKey

        public void setPrimaryKey(java.lang.Object key,
                          java.lang.Object value,
                          java.lang.String entityName)
        Sets the primary key value of the Ruleset BOM.
        Parameters:
        key - Contains name of the column of an entity.
        value - Contains value of column of an entity.
        entityName - Contains name of the entity of Ruleset business object.

      • upsertEntity

        public void upsertEntity(java.lang.String entityName,
                         java.lang.Object entityDtlsObj)
                  throws AppException,
                         InformationalException
        Update or insert an entity based on the entity name. This method will update or insert a RulesetInformation or RulesetLink entity.
        Parameters:
        entityName - Contains name of the entity.
        entityDtlsObj - Contains details of the entity.
        Throws:
        AppException - Generic Exception Signature.
        InformationalException - Generic Exception Signature.
